the young african score 2 point in the 1971 african cup of champion club
secteur 6 lose by 1 against the enugu ranger
as porto novo score no point against the victoria club mokanda
asc diaraf win against stade malien in the 1971 african cup of champion club
the young african score zero point in the 1971 african cup of champion club
secteur 6 win agains the enugu ranger
canon yaoundé score 5 more point than their opponent
resp:
import pandas as pd

data = {
    "team 1": ["al - merrikh", "abaluhya united", "asc diaraf", "maseru united", "as porto novo", "canon yaoundé", "espérance", "secteur 6", "young africans"],
    "agg": ["2 - 2 (5 - 4 pen)", "1 - 3", "3 - 4", "3 - 5", "0 - 3", "9 - 4", "1 - 0", "1 - 2", "2 - 0"],
    "team 2": ["tele sc asmara", "great olympics", "stade malien", "mmm tamatave", "victoria club mokanda", "as solidarité", "al - ahly (benghazi)", "enugu rangers", "lavori publici"],
    "1st leg": ["2 - 1", "0 - 0", "3 - 0", "1 - 2", "0 - 1", "7 - 3", "0 - 0", "1 - 1", "2 - 0"],
    "2nd leg": ["0 - 1", "1 - 3", "0 - 4", "2 - 3", "0 - 2", "2 - 1", "1 - 0", "0 - 1", "0 - 0"]
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Extract the scores from the 'agg' column
scores = df['agg'].str.extract('(\d+)', expand=False).astype(int)
# Calculate the difference between each team's score and their opponent's score
diffs = scores.diff()
# Check if Canon Yaoundé scores 5 more points than their opponent
canon_diff = diffs.loc[df['team 1'] == 'canon yaoundé']
if canon_diff.any():
    answer = "TRUE"
    relevant_cells = [{"row_index": i, "column_name": col} for i, row in df.iterrows() for col, val in zip(row, scores) if val > scores.loc[df['team 1'] == 'canon yaoundé'].iloc[0]]
elif diffs.any():
    answer = "FALSE"
    relevant_cells = [{"row_index": i, "column_name": col} for i, row in df.iterrows() for col, val in zip(row, scores) if val < scores.loc[df['team 1'] == 'canon yaoundé'].iloc[0]]
else:
    answer = "FALSE"
    relevant_cells = [{"row_index": i, "column_name": col} for i, row in df.iterrows() for col, val in zip(row, scores) if val != scores.loc[df['team 1'] == 'canon yaoundé'].iloc[0]]

print('{"answer": "%s", "relevant_cells": %s}' % (answer, relevant_cells))
